title: The Decade The Linux Kernel Stopped "Updating"
description:
There's been a bunch of weird periods in the history of Linux but the Linux 2.6 era was certainly one of the weirdest a time where the Linux kernel the kernel versioning system completely changed and we were stuck on the 2.6 branch for nearly a decade
